channel.title: Item Picture?
channel.description:
So when i have zogre bones in my inventory it looks like this:
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/08/40/83994008/photos/undefined/inv%20pic.png[/img]
But when i drop the item, it looks correct
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/08/40/83994008/photos/undefined/drop%20pic.png[/img]
Does anyone know how i can fix the picture it shows in my inventory? i have this problem with several items. Help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Item Picture?
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Try going to the models section, and requesting a full 317 item model package. <â€” Putting that in there, will make all the items normal looking.

Read full topic
